message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $140.
I appreciate the offer, but $140 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $130. Let's see if we can make this work.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've already discounted the price for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $137.50.
I appreciate the compromise, but $137.50 is still a bit too much for me. I'm willing to go to $135.  This is a fair price for both of us.
I'm glad we're close to an agreement, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $135. I'm willing to go to $138, but that's as low as I can go.
